[[File:JRE-E231-500-for-JRyamanote-line.jpg|300px|thumb|Yamanote Line E231 series EMU]]
[[File:Yamanote.png|300px|thumb|Route map]]
The '''Yamanote Line''' (山手線 やまのてせん) is a [[railway line]] of [[East Japan Railway Company]] (JR East) in [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]].

==Station==
{| class=wikitable
!style="border-bottom:3px solid #9acd32;" rowspan=2|Line<sup>1</sup>

'''Notes'''
:1: Official line names
:2: Left column is distance from previous station (km) and right column is distance from Shinagawa Station (km).
:3: "(R)" indicates rapid train stops of the Keihin-Tōhoku Line.
